result.name: educational-psychology-workforce-survey
result.notes: Annual survey of the local authority educational psychology services. Data collected includes the number of full and or part time or on maternity leave educational psychologists and assistant educational psychologists. Service areas EPs are working in, the size of the service, its workload, and how it is commissioned. The number of trainees on placement and how they are funded.

organization.name: national-college-for-teaching-and-leadership
organization.title: National College for Teaching and Leadership
organization.description: Created on 1 April 2013, when the "National College  for Leadership of Schools and Children's Services" merged with the "Teaching Agency" to become the "National College for Teaching and Leadership".

result.title: Educational Psychology Workforce Survey

extras.value: Published for the first time in March 2013. 2013 survey due to be published 31 March 2014. Prior to this reports were available on request only.
